Title: Relates to the state commission on prosecutorial conduct
Summary: Relates to the state commission on prosecutorial conduct; provides that the commission shall investigate complaints and may make a recommendation to the governor that a prosecutor be removed; provides that the commission shall transmit its findings of fact and recommendations to the appellate division; provides that the appellate division may accept or reject such recommendations or impose a different sanction.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to the state commission on prosecutorial conduct
